long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This is a simple extension which automatically redirects your searches so you don't have to worry about changing your browser search engine anymore. It will redirect Google Searches to Bing instead.

Update (v0.2.3) - 
Timer function restricted from functioning properly. This has been removed and now will redirect.
